snippet: A growing number of Americans are downsizing and retiring in multiple steps, continuing to work at least part time and moving more than once.
abstract: Retiring column; older Americans are choosing more gradual approach to retiring, in numbers that suggest that approach is becoming established behavior; in past, those approaching retirement age tended to change their circumstances only once by either retiring in places they already lived or selling their houses and moving to areas popular with other retirees.
lead_paragraph: A growing number of Americans are downsizing and retiring in multiple steps, continuing to work at least part time and moving more than once.

headline.main: Easing Into Leisure, One Step at a Time
headline.print_headline: Easing Into Leisure, One Step at a Time

keywords.value: Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania
keywords.name: organizations
